evidence.claim: Cleveland Clinic utilizes AWS for cloud services in its digital health solutions.
The organization is compliant with HIPAA regulations, indicating their use of health-specific data transaction sets.
Cleveland Clinic has incorporated FHIR standards for interoperability in health IT solutions.
They employ HL7 standards in their integration with EHRs and other health data platforms.
Their EDI capabilities include support for X12 formats, like the 837 for health claims processing.

icp.icp_reason: Cleveland Clinic uses X12 transactions for healthcare data exchange with APIs likely enhancing integration.
